title: indattAmadam
sahitya:
indattAmadam unakkazhagA inakula tilakA enniDam vazhakkA


anupallavi

  mundai vinai pOkki marumai tanai nIkki andamuDan ennai sondamadAkkiDa


caraNam    anru ulagaLanda ambuja aDiyiNai aDimaik-kedir vara nondaduvO
 kunru tUkki mAri kAtta kara kamalam anjal enraruLiDa ashaindaduvO
 ninaindu nangaikku niraiyuDai tandanaiyE inren vinai naDuvE ninraduvO
 kaNNinAl vaLarttiDum mIn ena un kaDaikkaNNaruL tandiDak-kaDaiyEnaik-kAttiDa
